927e6c04-5d70-4b4d-8023-d52eed5b3d77: A fatigued character cannot charge and takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. Doing anything that would normally cause fatigue causes the fatigued character to become {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}. After a complete {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}, fatigued characters are no longer fatigued.
830678b1-ccd4-418d-a351-f17a26399303: A staggered creature may take a single {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} (but not both, nor can he take {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round actions{/g}). A staggered creature can still take free, swift, and immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}.
4fa60c0b-cc16-4bb4-ab46-62a0df0d01e0:
A stunned creature can't take {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, and loses its {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to AC (if any).
Attackers receive a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} to perform {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g} against a stunned opponent.
d29a803d-09fe-4b8b-9168-5008ec2b689f: An exhausted character moves at half {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}, cannot charge, and takes a –6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. After a complete {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}, exhausted characters are no longer exhausted.
0b984bb0-1af7-4480-a082-02d8b2e08b05: Character inhaling the hot air suffers from moderate {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
f5a38bd4-25fb-4cf5-bcec-228aa8145a87: Character suffering from the frostbite takes severe {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}.
b03e3dc5-18f0-4a4b-9771-d0917800aa0a: Character suffering from the lava burn takes severe {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
e57cd725-6681-4e25-85c0-b18fd92c5ebb: Dazed Condition: The creature is unable to act normally. A dazed creature can take no {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, but has no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
77caa94a-a71c-43f9-a3b5-88c3a13b241b: For each negative level a creature has, it takes a cumulative –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. In addition, the creature reduces its current and total {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} by 5 for each negative level it possesses.
2bb609f3-f0fe-4578-b8e1-e8b4e4429150: Heavy rain reduces visibility, resulting in a -6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} and a 20% chance to miss on all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} due to {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
2332d861-ff93-4f7f-b881-77bdcd2888fb: Heavy snowfall reduces visibility, resulting in a -6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} and a 20% chance to miss on all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} due to {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
fc710749-a35e-4c5b-9c66-481d547e986e:
Injury; {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Save{/g}: Fortitude
Frequency: 1/hour for 8 hours
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}
Cure: 2 saves
c939b84a-648f-4b45-a5b5-196b581debdf: Pharasma's blessing helps you in battle and infusing your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with divine energy. All weapon attacks deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}divine damage{/g}.
7fd33c46-0268-47d9-a9d5-4dda33276c29: Stormy weather slows down movement by half and reduces visibility, resulting in a -6 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g} and a 20% chance to miss on all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} due to {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}.
2e312213-ccc0-43e7-92f1-a4dee65d4eea: The character is lying on the ground. A prone attacker cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. A prone defender gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}, but takes a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to AC against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g}.
6000efc6-fae2-492d-8d29-fe6b1bb381c3: The creature stands quietly. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target automatically breaks the effect.
e9e02077-7e97-4b82-b4f9-84482e44a99a:
The subject contracts the following disease: Blinding Sickness.
Frequency: 1/day
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}. Target must make an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} or become permanently {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}.
Cure: 2 consecutive saves
